title: SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE 11-12 [retr?tv]
description:
THE SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE

11. The Black Glove of Melchizedek    9/2/2000 
Phileas Fogg comes into possession of a single black glove covered with Cabalistic symbols. The glove, it turns out, is being hunted by two men: a mysterious Cabalistic sorcerer named Vargas, and a Chinese mystic, Zai Chao. Vargas confronts Fogg, threatening Passepartout&#039;s life for the glove. Fogg, though, manages to defeat Vargas despite his mystical abilities. Meanwhile, Rebecca has been kidnapped by Zai Chao, and is being used as a hostage to force Fogg to give him the glove.
  Guest star: Kim Chan (Zai Chao), Nigel Bennett (Jacomb Hyde), Tom McCamus (Vargas), Peter Cockett (James O&#039;Neilan), Andrea Lui (Wei San), Russell Yuen (Asian Fighter Guard #1), Fernando Chien (Asian Fighter Guard #2), Jason Cavalier (Asian Fighter Guard #3), Weifang Tang (Asian Fighter Guard #4), Houston Wong (Asian Fighter Guard #5)

12. Dust to Dust   10/1/2000 
A sarcophagus containing the remains of Nepka, an Egyptian high priest, is being transported to New York by Phileas Fogg for his old schoolmate, Professor Alexander Douglas, and an unusual woman, Adriana Locke. It becomes clear that Phileas has fallen under the spell of Adriana when he shows no interest in the mysterious deaths surrounding the sarcophagus.
  Guest star: Jonthan Coy (Sir Jonathan Chatsworth), Carl Alacchi (Manny), Antonio Falsetti (Newsboy), Randy Thomas (George-Security Guard), Victor A. Young (Alexander Douglas), Pascale BussÃƒÂ­eres (Adrianna Locke)
